Game Base.descricao: An ingenius Gul rifle designed to harness energy from Pan crystals. Charge to fire a 3- shot burst.
It's a bad leader what cant trust those beneath her to do what's right-who fears treachery behind every smile. Even if she's sometimes right, that ain't no way to live a life.
A small-caliber submachine gun best suited for close range skirmishes.
An accurate semi-automatic pistol that can rapidly fire small-caliber bullets.
A mid-range Pistol Shotgun with a brisk fire rate and medium recoil Slower reload.
Astandard issue military spec sidearm known for its reliability and accuracy.
A powerful hand cannon witha low capacity cylinder. High damage and a heavy kick.
A high-caliber single-shot hunting pistol that inflicts heavy damage at mid to long range.
A suppressed small-caliber automatic pistol with medium magazine capacity and a high fire rate.
A classic six-shooter. Tough. Dependable.
An old antique pistol.

The Dark Horizon.descricao: Fires a stream of nanomachines, dealing damage to enemies or healing allies for 3.15% of their Max Health per second. The nano-tech Turrets and Drones.

Game Base.descricao: Projectiles return on hit or after reaching max range. Reloading retrieves shot projectiles. Max 5 fired projectiles. Infinite Ammo. Can overheat.
Game Base.moddesc: Cube Shield Generates a Cube Shield which absorbs up to 500 damage from incoming enemy projectiles. Lasts 15s. Reactivating fires the Cube Shield which damages enemies as it travels. Damage is increased if the Cube Shield has absorbed enemy projectile damage before firing. Mod Power Requirement: 1,000

Game Base.descricao: Fires an electrical stream that jumps to nearby targets within 7.5m, dealing 30% reduced damage per jump. Applies OVERLOADED, dealing 30 SHOCK damage every 5 seconds for 5.2s.
Game Base.moddesc: Drives electrified rods which tether to other rods within 10m. Tethers deal 20 SHOCK damage per second. Targets embedded with a rod take 20 SHOCK damage per second. They take 20% additionally damage per extra rod in the target. Damage is increased by 1.5% if linked to another rod. Rods in the same target will not link.

Game Base.descricao: Spews flames that apply BURNING which deals 250 FIRE damage over 10 seconds.
Game Base.moddesc: Fires an explosive round that deals up to 175 damage within 9m.

Game Base.descricao: Fires volatile grenades that explode on direct contact with enemies and deal AOE damage within 4m. Dormant grenades eventually explode and can also be shot to detonate early.
Game Base.moddesc: Fire a high-powered rocket that deals up to 200 damage within 2.5m.

Game Base.descricao: Fires a stream of superhot ACID gas which applies the CORRODED effect, dealing 300 CORROSIVE Damage over 15s. Killing targets CORRODED by Nebula spawns a gas cloud which applies its on-hit effect. Gas clouds lasts 2s and can be refreshed.
Game Base.moddesc: Unleash a swarm of Nanomachines that seek after enemies within 20 meters and repeatedly attack dealing 6 ACID damage per hit and applying CORROSIVE, dealing 100 ACID damage over 10s. Lasts 15 seconds

Game Base.descricao: A pistol infused with mysterious Fae magic. Rapidly fires 3-round bursts of energy. Trigger can be held to continuously fire.
Game Base.mod: Applies a Soul Brand to all enemies within 25m which lasts 25s. Enemies killed while bearing the Soul Brand leave behind an Echo which lasts 10s before returning to the Nightmare Realm. Echoes are drawn to any survivor who walks within 3m, granting 10% of Max Health on contact.
Game Base.moddesc: Soul Brand

Game Base.descricao: The last vestiges of a fallen sister, this mystical crossbow pistol has the ability to recall its bolts to heal the wielder.
Game Base.moddesc: Recalls bots which deal 30 damage when pulled from a target and when striking targets on their return. Recalled bolts grant 2% of Max HP. Recalled bolts can also overfill Sorrow by up to +5. Any additional bolts will be returned to reserves.

Game Base.descricao: Fires a fast moving projectile which explodes on contact. Explosion has no damage falloff.
Game Base.moddesc: Funnels all current Mod Charges into the next shot. Projectiles deal 65 direct damage and 65 Explosive damage in a 5m per Charge consumed. Explosion applies 75 BURNING damage over 10s per Charge consumed. Additional Charges consumed increase all damage by 5%. Max 5 Charges

The Awakened King.descricao: Fires heated bits of molten slag. Can be charged to fire a single explosive rod at the cost of causing damage to the wielder while charging.
The Awakened King.moddesc: Rapidly fire volatile needles that explode after 1.5s dealing 30 explosive damage. Deals additional damage to low health targets.

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: A powerful Pan crossbow designed for mid-range combat. Fires 3 bolts at a time.

Game Base.descricao: Fires a hypercharged wide-arcing line that passes through targets.
Game Base.moddesc: Fires the compressed remains of a dying star. On contact or hit wit the primary fire, causes Supernova to explode for 150 FIRE Damage, and 350 BURNING Damage over 10s to all targets within 4m. Striking the Supernova with Aphelion's primary fire increases its explosion radius by 25% and damage by 50%, and spawns a massive shockwave that deals 300 FIRE damage and also applies the initial BURNING amount. Generates 1 Primary Ammo on fire.

Game Base.descricao: After charging, fires an accurate high-damage rail which penetrates any target. Each successful hit reduces the charge time by 0.1s and increases damage by 10% for 1.5s. Stacks 5x.
Game Base.moddesc: Brands a target for 30s. Branded enemies that die leave a Brand at their location. Reloading or Swapping detonates Brands dealing 275 damage. Additional Brands (3 Max) on the same target deal 50% damage. Slain enemies return 5-15% of Ammo and Mod power to the weapon

Game Base.descricao: The moon gives Fae their strength..or so the stories say. In truth, the Fae give Fae their strength, and the moon is but one inspiration.
Game Base.moddesc: Empowers the Bow for 15s. Arrows apply Moonlight to enemies for 3s. Enemies struck by Crescent Moon while Moonlit release a Moon Essence which returns 1 arrow, heals 5% of Max Health, and grants 15% Fire and Reload Speed for 5s. Basic Shots automatically become Charged Shots. Perfect Shots fire two arrows.

Game Base.descricao: A pinpoint accurate split-barreled rifle that fires two penetrating rails. High base damage, but cannot score Weakspot hits. Charge to fire
Game Base.moddesc: Conjures 3 sword fragments that encircle the wielder for 30s. Performing a Melee Attacks lets loose a Fragment which taints the blood of targets, causing all attacks from Deceit to register as Weaspot hits for a short period of time. Charge Melee attack fires all remaining Fragments at once, but they taint blood for a shorter duration for each throw.

Game Base.descricao: Fires tooth-like flechettes. When weapon reticle is fully compressed, flechettes apply 200 BLEEDING Damage over 10s.
Game Base.moddesc: Fires a devastating blast which penetrates through all enemies in its path. Deals 120 damage with a 25% Critical damage bonus, and 2x additional stagger. Bloodline damage increases by 50% for each enemy penetrated.

Game Base.descricao: A device forged of pure evil. Fires hardened bone shards at bonus stagger. Semi-automatic with a medium kick.
Game Base.moddesc: Enter the Nightmare Realm. Nightfall gains infinite Ammo, a 25% Fire Rate increase, 10% Lifesteal, and becomes fully automatic. The wielder becomes significatly harder to hit while moving. Disables other weapons and Skills for the duration, or until Dreadwalker is deactivated. Lasts 10s.

Game Base.descricao: An energy-based cutting tool that increases damage when focused ona target. Can overheat.
Game Base.moddesc: Forces open Plasma Cutter's heat vents dispersing all heat. While active, Plasma Cutter generates 50% less heat, and ramping damage cap is increased to 3x Damage. Overheats automatically when deactivated. Lasts 20s.

Game Base.descricao: A high-powered Bow which deals bonus damage to Weakspots. Can be charged for increased effect. Perfect release after Charge for maximum damage
Game Base.moddesc: Fires a powerful arrow which deals 30 damage and opens a 7m portal that rains down star fragments. Each fragment deals 50 damage within 4m. Lasts 6s.

Game Base.descricao: A strange device which fires a bouncing Energy Disc that can hit up to 5 enemies in close proximity. Damage is reduced with each bounce.
Game Base.moddesc: Calls down a Guardian Sword on enemies struck by an Energy Disc. Swords deal 100 damage and 3x stagger within 5m.

Game Base.descricao: Converted from experimental Dreamer tech, ideal for mid-range combat. Weapon becomes more accurate the longer AIM is held.
Game Base.moddesc: Banishes enemies or allies into another dimension for 4s. When Banish ends, enemies take 1.25x the damage from the Repulsor's primary fire for 8s Powerful enemies won't be banished, but will take increased damage from any Repulsor while debuffed.

Game Base.descricao: A old Fusion Rifle refactored to store and violently release energy in each shot. Can be charged for more damage. Perfect release after Charge for maximum damage.
Game Base.moddesc: Imbues shots with White hot FIRE. Hits apply BURNING, dealing 100 FIRE damage over 10 seconds. Lasts 20s. Hitting an enemy cause shots to fragment, automatically targeting nearby enemies. Fragments strike for 50% of the initial damage dealt and apply BURNING.

Game Base.descricao: Alien rifle that shoots high velocity beams which penetrate enemies. Equipped with a 2.5x magnification scope. Double Tap AIM to Scope.
Game Base.moddesc: Fires a highly compressed sphere which draws in objects and deals 50 damage on impact. When colliding with a target, a large Gravity Well opens and draws in objects for 4s. When the Gravity Well expires, it deals 375 damage within 10m. Adds 250 damage per enemy and divides total damage among all enemies.

Game Base.descricao: An exceptionally powerful single—shot weapon that deals bonus stagger damage. Must reload after each round fired.
Game Base.moddesc: Fires a rotten spore that releases a specialized gas cloud over 6m. Applies SLOW to enemies while dealing 15 damage per second for 7s. Grants HASTE to allies, which lasts 5s after leaving the cloud.

The Awakened King.descricao: An once-beautiful weapon, rumored to corrupt its wielder with absolute power.
The Awakened King.moddesc: Harpoon Mode: Fire Harpoon to mark target causing primary fire to become Homing Rounds dealing 15% reduced damage. Enemies hit by Homing Rounds build Influence. Recasting exits Mode. When Influence fills, Monarch automatically reloads and creates a shockwave, and wielder becomes a Tyrant, gaining 20% Increased Damage and Infinite Reserves. Lasts 20s.

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: Fires concentrated sand. Sustained primary fire and Sandstorm hits apply EXPOSED for 1s. Max 15s. EXPOSED: Target receives 15% additional damage from all sources.
The Forgotten Kingdom.moddesc: Launch a sphere of loam. Impact creates a 5m swirling storm of sand which seeks to center itself on an enemy and deals 225 Elemental damage per second. When Sandstorm‘s focused target dies, it will seek a new enemy within 10m. Lasts 15s.

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: (description changes every time you open inventory)
Fires homing needles which deal 5 Explosive Damage after sticking for 2s. When 5 needles are stuck in a target at once, BLOWBACK triggers, dealing 50 Explosive Damage instead.
The Forgotten Kingdom.moddesc: Disables automatic BLOWBACK, while increasing Thorn's Reload Speed by 25%. and fire Rate by 15%. Reactivating the Mod will trigger an EMPOWERED BLOWBACK, which detonates all needles at oncefor 100% additional damage. Lasts 20s.

The Dark Horizon.descricao: N'Erudian tool with low energy reserves that generates energy bolts. Charging turbines generates additional projectiles. Max 5.
The Dark Horizon.moddesc: Activate while a valid target is in-sights, marking it with quantum Entanglement. All Genesis projectiles seek to the Entanglement target after initial impact, dealing 50% of Primary Fire damage.

The Dark Horizon.descricao: A mysterious relic that fires super-dense penetrating rails. Can be charged to unleash violent levels of energy. Warning: Overcharging may have catastrophic results.
The Dark Horizon.moddesc: Activation stabilizes Monorail, increasing Charge Speed by 25% and reducing Recoil and Sway by 75%. Lasts 20s. Additionally, for each 5% of the Charge Meter filled upon firing, gain 1% Critical Chance and Critical Damage. Max 20%.

Game Base.descricao: Fires rocket that deals AOE damage within 2m. Charging the weapon can load additional rockets.  (Max 3). Cannot Weakspot
Game Base.moddesc: Fires a cluster bomb which detonates on impact across 2.5m. each cluster deals up to 150 damage per explosion within 3.5m

Game Base.descricao: A pistol infused with erroneous properties. Fires energy, allowing the trigger to be held for continuous fire.
Game Base.moddesc: Applies Death Brand to all enemies within 25m. increasing incoming damage by 10%. Enemies killed while bearing the Death Brand leave behind an Echo which lasts 10s before returning to the Nightmare Realm. Echoes are drawn to any survivor who walks within 3m. increasing Weakspot Damage dealt by 10% for 10s.

Corrupted Long Guns.descricao: Fires a hypercharged wide-arcing line that passes through targets.
Corrupted Long Guns.moddesc: Fires 5 shattered compressed remains of a dying star. On contact or when hit with the primary fire, Micronova explodes for 75 FIRE damage, and 200 BURNING damage over 10s to all targets within 2.75m. Striking the Micronova with Corrupted Aphelion's primary fire increases its explosion radius by 25%, damage by 50%, and spawns a shockwave that deals 150 FIRE damage, detonates any nearby Micronovas and applies the initial BURNING amount. Generates 1 Primary Ammo on fire.

Corrupted Long Guns.descricao: A pinpoint accurate split-barreled rifle that fires two penetrating rails. High base damage, but cannot score Weakspot hits. Charge to fire.
Corrupted Long Guns.moddesc: Fires a ring of spinning blades which penetrates targets as it travels up to 20m before returning to the weapon. While traveling, activating Windfall again causes the projectile to spin in place for up to 3s. Activating it once more will recall it. Enemies struck by the Windfall obtain Tainted Blood for 3s causing all attacks from Deceit to trigger as Weakspot hits.

Corrupted Long Guns.descricao: Fires high-powered nails. Limited magazine size.
Corrupted Long Guns.moddesc: While active, grants unlimited Reserve Ammo and increases Reload Speed by 30%. If the entire magazine hits a Weakspot, Merciless will automatically perform a quick Reload. Lasts 13s.

Corrupted Long Guns.descricao: Fully automatic mechanisms launch a bouncing Energy Disc that can hit up to 2 enemies in close proximity. Damage is reduced after bouncing.
Corrupted Long Guns.moddesc: Imbues the Arbalest with the power of Yaesha's corrupted guardian, increases Fire Rate by 20%, reduces Recoil and Sway by 25% and each disc impact with an enemy explodes over 3.5m for 69 - 207 damage. Lasts 15s.

Corrupted Long Guns.descricao: Black crystal weapon which increases Fire Rate as mod power is generated. Mod power slowly drains after 10s of not dealing damage.
Corrupted Long Guns.moddesc: Funnels all current Mod Charges into a powerful penetrating beam. The beam deals 100 - 300 damage and increases damage dealt, recoil, and beam thickness per Charge consumed. Additionally reloads 20% Primary Ammo per charge consumed. Max 5 Charges.

Melee Weapons.descricao: A long, sharp blade hammered out of vehicle leaf springs. Well-rounded for most situations.
A short, but thick sword, used by Gul Warriors. It's compact design makes for swift yet hard-hitting blows. An excellent close-range option.
A razor-sharp hand axe. Excellent for separating flesh from bone. Charge for double attacks.
Makeshift claws fashioned from decayed root and rusted metal.
An elegant, yet light blade, designed to bring beauty to bloodshed. Unstoppable in the hands of a master swordsman.
A giant broadsword made from flattened railroad tracks. Dozens of ridges cut in the side for causing irreparable damage.
Steel knuckles with rusty sawblade tips, designed to boost Unarmed damage.
Basic Strikes generate 10% additional Mod Power. Charge Attacks perform an AOE which strikes all enemies within 2m, dealing 75 Damage. AOE Damage generates 50% additional Mod Power.
An intricately-forged elongated sword. Designed to keep stronger enemies at bay, while remaining light enough for agile maneuvers.
An intricately-forged mace with uniquely designed airways. Allows smaller wielders to get the mace up to speed much quicker.
A spear perfect for staying at a distance. Has excellent range, great recovery, and focused direct damage for one on one combat.
Standard issue Greatsword for the Empress's Royal Guards. Razor-sharp edges, extremely heavy, yet perfectly balanced.
A pair of old-canine training bracers converted into deadly claws. Used for slashing and ripping.
A large, heavy warhammer cobbled together from engine components. It is a slow- but-devastating weapon meant to destroy anything it hits.
A common chopping tool that has been repurposed for combat. Rapidly cycles attacks from right to left. Charge attacks strike twice.
A staff made from old plumbing parts used for controlling wide swaths in front of the wielder.
An unorthodox weapon meant to convert momentum into destruction. Some attacks can continuously chain overhead swings.

Game Base.descricao: A powerful crushing device that harnesses rocket technology to increase smashing force.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge Melee Attacks increase the speed of all Melee Attacks by 10% for 5s.

Game Base.descricao: Lightweight. Silent. Deadly. It's rumored that the blade is meant to bestow a slow, agonizing death.
Game Base.moddesc: Damage increases by +25% against BLEEDING enemies, and +25% when attacking from behind. Charge Attacks deal 100 BLEEDING damage over 10s

Game Base.descricao: Molecules to atoms, atoms to protons, protons to quarks--down and down into the fundamental quanticles of the universe. The deeper one goes, the more one understands how much one does not understand.
Game Base.moddesc: On Neutral Evade Attacks Atom Splitter achieves Nuclear Fission, releasing a wave of charged particles which deals 151.5 Damage to targets within 10m. Charged Neutral Evade Attacks increase range by 3x and Damage by 25%

Game Base.descricao: There is an ethereal lightness to this weapon, as though it were made of paper or breath. Though it strikes its foes forcibly enough.
Game Base.moddesc: After dealing 250 damage, Charge Attack will release a Dreamwave, flowing outwards 20m and returning to caster. Dreamwave applies SLOW to all enemies for 10s and grants a Stack of REVERIE for each enemy affected. Each Stack grants +2% to All Damage and +2% Movement Speed, which lasts 15s.

Game Base.descricao: A pair of gauntlets with sharp crystal blades that strike with vicious speed and velocity.
Game Base.moddesc: Dealing Melee Damage 6 times over 10s empowers Feral Judgement. When empowered, Neutral Backdash Charge Attacks apply Death Sentence. After 1.5s of being sentenced, the enemy will suffer 10 Phantom Strikes, dealing X25 Damage each. Deals 25% additional damage to BLEEDING enemies.

Game Base.descricao: An expertly balanced blade that is the product of advanced Fae metallurgy.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge Attacks taint the blood of targets, causing all attacks from Godsplitter to register as Weakspot hits for 3s seconds. Duration increases with additional fragments. Max 35s.

Game Base.descricao: An ancient, quick, and versatile blade suited for many situations. Charge attacks cast a projectile for dealing melee damage at range.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge attacks use 35 stamina to release an energy wave projectile allowing the wielder to strike enemies from much farther away.

Game Base.descricao: Melee charged attacks apply CORROSION, dealing 100 ACID damage over 5s.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge attacks use 25 stamina to throw the spear, which returns to the wielder's hand.

Game Base.descricao: Fast striking claws with a high Critical Hit Chance. Neutral Dodge grants the power  of Lifesteal.
Game Base.moddesc: Neutral Evade turns to mist, granting Nightshade 5% base damage as Lifesteal for 5s. Perfect Dodge doubles duration.

Game Base.descricao: A magical stave rumored to contain a healing spirit within. Strikes with wide swings.
Game Base.moddesc: After dealing 250 damage, the next charge attack causes the spirit of the RED DOE to stampede forward, dealing 160 damage to enemies and regenerating 10% Health to allies in its path.

Game Base.descricao: A super-heated laser sword with an infinitely sharp edge. Perfect for cutting... anything.
Game Base.moddesc: Neutral Backdash Charge creates a Whirlwind of slashes which strike all enemies within 8m for 75 damage.

Game Base.descricao: A massive Greatsword which contains the harnessed magic of a corrupted Guardian. Can summon small shockwaves.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge to fire off ground-based shockwaves which deal 115 damage. Costs 35 Stamina

Game Base.descricao: Dealing damage unleashes the dormant Toxic Gas within the head. When infused, Basic Attacks apply CORRODED for 5s.
Game Base.moddesc: When infused, Neural Backdash Charge Attack explodes in a 3m. AOE and leaves an ACID Cloud which last for 15s.

Game Base.descricao: A scorched blade imbued with FIRE.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge Melee Attacks apply BURNING which deals 200 FIRE damage over 5s

Game Base.descricao: A glowing Greatsword forged from shards of a shattered Worldstone. Charge attacks cast waves.
Game Base.moddesc: Charge Attacks release a wide horizontal projectile that penetrates through multiple enemies dealing 116 damage.

The Awakened King.descricao: A hammer-like anchor that swings with an exceptionally irregular ferocity.
The Awakened King.moddesc: Charged Melee Hits grant Fathomless Deep which increases Melee Staggern by 10% per stack for 5s. Max 3 attacks.

The Awakened King.descricao: An evil-fueled reaping tool that deals additional damage to suffering targets
The Awakened King.moddesc: Increases Melee Damage by 10% if the target is suffering from a Negative Status Effect.

The Awakened King.descricao: A massive hammer infused with the souls of deceased Dran. Its dormant power can be awakened by taking damage.
The Awakened King.moddesc: Incoming damage grants Awakening which increases Melee Damage by 5% per stack for 10s. Max 10 stacks.

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: The staff hums with energy. A destructive power within yearns to be released.
The Forgotten Kingdom.moddesc: Charged Melee empowers the staff for 10s, causing melee attacks to launch an energy bolt that seeks enemies within 30m, dealing 50 SHOCK Damage and grants 1 stack of POWER STONE. Max 10 stacks. While empowered, Charged Melee calls a 6m shockwave dealing 75 SHOCK damage and ends POWER STONE. For each POWER STONE stack built when ended, release 1 energy bolt that seeks a random enemy and applies OVERLOAD for 10s

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: The mace whirs as if living harmonics hold its shape. When swung. a breath of sand tethers to the rock crown for extended reach and lethal momentum.
The Forgotten Kingdom.moddesc: Maintaining an overhead Charged Melee forms a 5m cyclone, dealing 35 damage per second and pulls enemies forward the wielder. Each Cyclone hit applies EXPOSED for 3s. Max 15s. EXPOSED: Target receives 15% additional damage from all sources

The Dark Horizon.descricao: A massive weapon of pure destruction. Attacks can be enhanced by Charging at the cost of Stamina over time. Increases Encumbrance by 15.
The Dark Horizon.moddesc: Charged Attacks become INDOMITABLE INDOMITABLE: Grants 15% Damage Reduction, converts all damage taken to Grey Health, and prevents wielder from being staggered. Charging increases maximum damage by up to 350%

The Dark Horizon.descricao: The gauntlets harness the power of a neutron star and a black hole. When merged, cosmic forces are unleashed.
The Dark Horizon.moddesc: Charged Melee empowers the Gauntlets for 15s, increases Standard Melee Damage by 25% and causing Charged Melee Attacks to release 8m penetrating blasts. Each blast reduces the duration. While empowered, performing a Charged Melee Attack during a Neutral Backdash gathers power for up to 5s, then fires a DARKNESS BEAM that deals 125 Melee Damage every 0.5s. The beam duration equals its time charge, then ends Kilonova after firing

The Dark Horizon.descricao: Harvester automaton limb fitted with a plasma torch. The system breach of a Drzyr phantom initiated jettisoned protocols, trapping strange properties within the makeshift weapon.
The Dark Horizon.moddesc: Charged melee attacks release a Phantom that trails behind the host weapon, dealing 35% of the Harvester Scythe's damage. Each hit of the Phantom Blade increases Melee Attack Speed and Melee Charge Speed by 6% for 5s. Max 5 stacks.

Game Base.descricao: Fires a short range burst of 7 star fragments which deal 35 damage each. Fragments bounce off walls up to 3 times, dealing 35% additional damage per bounce. Weakspot hits deal reduced damage.

Shoots out razor-sharp Chain Shards which impale up to 5 targets within 15m, dealing 10 damage. On hit, chains are pulled towards the caster, dealing 250 damage split equally among enemies and applying 275 BLEEDING damage over 15s.

Fires a drill projectile which bores into enemies on contact, dealing 80 damage. After fully burrowing into an enemy, creates a Weakspot which grants 165% of normal Weakspot Damage on hit. If attached to an existing Weakspot, Ranged Crit Chance is increased by 15% when attacking the drill. Lasts 10s.
Fires a focused blast of air through all targets within 8m, dealing 155 damage and 5x impact.
Imbues ammunition with TOXIC and increases Range Crit Chance by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply CORRODED, dealing 100 damage over 10s.

Infects weapon with Malware for 30s, causing shots to apply FRAGMENTED for 5s. When a FRAGMENTED enemy dies, they create a Glitch that lasts 15s. Picking up a Glitch increases All damage by 20% for 15s. Destroying a Glitch causes it to destabilize, creating a 5m Virus Pool which deals 25 damage per second and applies the FRAGMENTED debuff to enemies inside. Virus Pools last 15s.
Deploys an energy barrier on impact with ground. Allies can shoot through Energy Wall but enemy projectiles are absorbed (up to 500 damage received). Max 1 Wall at a time. Lasts 30s.

Summons Faerie Familiar to aid in combat. The Familiar selects a random enemy within 10m and slashes through them for 25 damage each attack. Familiar will select a new target when the previous one dies. Lasts 15s.

Calls forth an eye of Legion to gaze at player's AIM target. For every 0.25s Fargazer focuses on a target within 25m, a stack of MADNESS Status is applied for 5s. Each stack deals 3.3 Damage per second. Max 10 stacks. Lasts 30s.
Creates a whirling cyclone that sucks in nearby targets and applies BURNING for 10s. The center of the cyclone deals 75 FIRE damage per second. Lasts 15s.

Launches a payload that explodes on contact with allies, healing 30% of their max health. When no ally is struck, payload lays dormant until an ally gets close. Dormant payload lasts 30s, slowly losing healing potency over time.
Shoots a helix of missiles, dealing 120 damage. On contact, divides into 6 smaller rockets which seek additional targets, dealing 30 damage on contact.
Imbues ammunition with FIRE and increases Ranged damage by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply BURNING, dealing 200 FIRE Damage over 10 seconds.
Imbues ammunition with SHOCK and increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 15% for 20 seconds. Shots also apply OVERLOADED, dealing 35 SHOCK Damage every 5s for 15s.
Fires a superheated beam which deals 25 Mod Damage per second. Sustaining the beam on a target causes an explosion which deals 150 Mod damage in a 3m AOE.
Launches a projectile which summons a Root Tentacle. Tentacles deal 30 damage and steal 1.5% of the hero's Max Health per hit. Lasts 20s. (Max 2)
Fires a rotten arrow that deals 75 damage and detonates for another 100 damage within 1.5m.
Fires a caltrops grenade that explodes to cover an area of 6m. Caltrops deal 20 damage per second and SLOW to enemies that walk over them. Lasts 10s.

Fires a Wretched Spear which embeds itself on contact. Spears deal 125 damage on hit, rapidly dividing inside the target until bursting, dealing 140 damage to all targets within 3m. Spears embedded in the environment remain in place for 10s.

Fires a shot infused with the binding power of the Song of Eafir. Staggers most ground enemies within 10m and deals 150 damage to Flying enemies within the same range. The song continues for 15s, afflicting targets within 15m with SLOW, and a 10% decrease to damage dealt.
Fires a projectile that attaches to the enemy dealing 40 damage. Enemies within 7m become bound to the primary target after impact and share 60% of damage dealt to them. Lasts 15s.
Launch an alien egg that bursts on impact, releasing 5 Space Crabs. Crabs follow the caster, leaping towards enemies within 4m, and exploding, dealing 60 Damage each.
Fires a beam which deals 15 damage per second, and applies SLOW Debuff. After 3s of application to a target, SLOW becomes STASIS, freezing the target in place for 10s.
Creates a 6m blast which freezes all standard enemies for 7s. Dealing damage to frozen enemies immediately breaks the Time Lapse effect, applying SLOW for the remaining duration.
Fires a projectile that cracks the ground and spawns shockwaves that deal 75 damage Within 9m for 6s. Shockwaves inflict 3x impact.

Launches a slow-moving orb that pulses every 0.5s, striking enemies within 3m for 20 SHOCK damage and applying OVERLOADED for 15s. The orb lasts 20s. The orb can be overcharged by striking it with additional damage.
Fires a highly volatile projectile that explodes to leave a line of flaming terrain. Deals 55 FIRE Damage per second, and applies BURNING, dealing 200 damage over 10s. Lasts 5s.

The Awakened King.descricao: Shoots a cannister out that shatters on impact to reveal an expanding mist, starting at 7.5m and growing to 15m over 5s. The mist lasts 20s. While affected, enemies receive 25% additional Status Effect Damage and are 5% more likely to be struck with a critical hit from any source. The mists debuff persists for 10s after target exits the mist.
Summons Knight Guard to aid in combat. The Guards hurl penetrating slashes at a random enemy dealing 15 damage. The Guards will melee enemies if close enough for 15 damage. Lasts 20s

Calls forth 7 phantom spears to encircle the wielder for 25 seconds. This ring will deal up to 35 damage per second to nearby enemies, based on the number of spears remaining in the ring. While the mod is active, these spears can be thrown by tapping the mod button, dealing 100 damage to the first enemy hit. Spears will remain at their impact point for the duration of the mod or until recalled by holding the mod button. When recalled, spears will return to the wielder, dealing 50 damage to enemies along their path. When all recalled spears have reached the wielder, they cause an explosion dealing up to 350 damage based on the number of spears recalled.

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: Imbues ammunition with BLEED and increases Lifesteal by 5% for 20s. Shots also apply BLEEDING, dealing 200 damage over 10s.

Fires a projectile that deploys up to 5 traps after contacting the ground Each trap can launch a flask of deadly liquid up to 15m when an enemy travels above and will rearm once every 0.9s. Flasks detonation release a 7m shockwave that deals 50 Damage and splashes targets within 4m of the center for 170 ACID Damage, applying CORRODED for 43.8 damage over 10s. Lasts 20s or 10 total flask launches.
Activates a 15m aura of sweltering heat, causing enemies inside the aura for 3s to begin BURNING for 250 FIRE Damage per second for 5s. Lasts 30s.

The Dark Horizon.descricao: Releases 5 Harvester Bots for 30s that seek an enemy to siphon, granting allies within 30m a stack of DRAIN. Gain 1% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal per stack. Max 5 stacks.

Launches a payload that bursts on contact with allies, applying a SHIELD for 25% of their Max Health for 15s. Max 50% SHIELD. When no ally is struck, payload lays dormant until an ally gets  close. Dormant payload lasts 30s and slowly loses Shield potency over time

Launches a projectile that releases a Voidlight which remains dormant for 10s. While active, absorbs other damage sources. After expiration, explodes and fires up to 5 projectiles which hone in on enemies within 15m. Projectiles deal 250 Mod Damage split among enemies hit, dealing an additional 150 per 100 Base Damage absorbed. Max 5x.

Ranged.descricao: On hit, grants a 10% chance to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon. Level 10: When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s
Increases Weakspot Damage by 10% for every 400 Mod Power Spent by the attached weapon's mod. Max 3 Stacks. Lasts 10s. Level 10: At Max Stacks, gain 10% Critical Chance on Weakspot Hits.
Increases Fire Rate by 7% and an additional 1% for every 10% of Magazine missing. Level 10: Reload Speed is increased by 1.5% Reload Speed per 10% Magazine Missing (Max 30%)
Mod use increases Fire Rate of this weapon by 10% for 7s. Level 10: Increases Mod Generation of this weapon by 15%. Lasts 7s.
Continuously Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10% over 3s. Level 10: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.
Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 20%. Level 10: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 20% when reloading from empty.
Attached Mod deals 10% additional Mod Damage. Level 10: Attached Mod use gains a 15% chance to not consume charge.
Using this weapon's Mod generates 10% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack. Level 10: Mod Damage generates 15% of damage dealt as Mod Power.
After 2 consecutive Weakspot Hits, increase the damage of the next Weakspot Hit by 20%. Level 10: Increases Weakspot Critical Chance by 15%.
Increases Mod Damage by 10%. Level 10: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.
Switching to this weapon creates an Explosive Burst which deals 50 Damage to all enemies within 7m. Level 10: This weapon's kills with any Explosive Damage reduce Kill Switch cooldown by 1s
Reduces the Heat Generation of this weapon by 25%. Level 10: Reload Speed is increased up to 55% based on this weapon's Heat accumulation.
Increases this weapon's reload speed by 4% for base damage dealt between reloads. Lasts 7s. Max 5 Stacks. Level 10: Reloading this weapon at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% for 15s.

When this weapon scores a Critical Hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5% for 3s. Max 10 stacks. Level 10: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.
Shots from this weapon have a 20% chance to return spent Ammo to reserves. Level 10: Refunded Ammo has a 25% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.
This weapon's Charged Shots decrease the Charge time of Subsequent Charge Shots by 10% for 5s. Level 10: While active, Charged Primary Shots grant 1% Ranged Critical Chance per round spent. Max 15.
Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10%. Last 3s. Level 10: Increases reload Speed by 15%.
Reloading increases the damage of the Attached Mod by 25% for 5s Level 10: Casting Attached Mod increases Reload Speed by 25%. Lasts 5s
Regenerate 2% Health over 10s for every 150 Mod Power spent. Level 10: Allies within 15m are healed for 50% of the primary effect.
Increases Charge Speed of Bows and Fusion Rifles by 10%. Level 10: Charged Primary Shots of Bows and Fusion Rifles gain 15% Critical Chance.
Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 10m for 3.5s. Level 10: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.

Increases this weapon's Ranged Damage by up to 7.5% based on how close the magazine capacity is to full. Level 10: Increases this weapon's Weakspot Damage by up to 20% based on how close the magazine capacity is to full.
Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10% for 15s. Level 10: Ammo pickups are added directly to into this weapon's magazine.
Increases Ranged damage of this weapon by 10% to BLEEDING targets. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply BLEEDING, dealing 200 BLEED damage over 20s.

Melee.descricao: Increases Melee Damage by 20% for 10s when activating a Skill. Level 10: Base Damage Dealt reduce skill cooldowns by 5%.
Melee Strikes increase the damage of the next Backdash Evade Attack by 4%. Max 5 Stacks. Lasts 7.5s. Level 10: Perfect Neutral Evades grants 5 stacks
Increases Melee Charge Speed by 15% and Melee Attack Speed by 10%. Level 10: Gain 3% of based Charged Melee Damage dealt as Lifesteal.
Melee Weapons with special abilities which become readied by dealing melee damage require 10% less damage to charge. Level 10: Increase the potency of readied Melee Special abilities by 25%.
Increase Melee damage by 6% for each unique Negative Status the target is suffering from. Level 10: Melee Attacks apply SLOW for 3s.
Perfect Dodge activates OPPORTUNITY which increases Melee Critical Chance of the next 2s by 50% for 3s. Level 10: While OPPORTUNITY is active, any dodge or combat slide refreshes the duration.
Melee Critical Hits increase Melee Critical Chance by 5% for 7.5s. stacking up to 5 times. Level 10: Melee Critical Strikes deal 20% additional damage.
Reduces the Stamina Cost of all Charged Melee Attacks by 25%. Level 10: Melee Charge Attacks gain 15% additional damage and 10% Critical Chance.
Gain 15% Melee Damage when Grey Health is present. Level 10: Reduces Stagger by 1 when using any Melee Attack
Melee Attacks grants a Shield for 3% of Max Health for 5s. Max 30% Shield. Level 10: Charged Melee Attacks deal 25% additional melee damage based on current Shield amount.

Empowers weapon after 3 hits. While empowered. the next Charged Melee hit strikes all enemies within 10m with SHOCK Damage. Level 10: The SHOCK Damage now applies OVERLOADED dealing 100 damage over 5.05s.
Charged Melee Attacks cannot be interrupted and gain 5% damage reduction from all sources. Level 10: All damage taken during Charged Melee Attack is converted to Grey Health.
Increases the Status Effect Damage applied by Melee Attacks by 25%. Level 10: Charged Melee Attacks lower enemy's Resistance to All Status Damage by 10%. Lasts 10s.
Melee Hits increase Melee Damage by 3% for 10s Max 5 Stacks. Level 10: Increases Movement Speed by 3% per stack.
Melee Hits generate 5% Ammo Reserves for both Firearms. Cooldown 10s. Level 10: When a Firearm reserve is full, melee Strikes increase Reload Speed by 50% after Ammo transfer
Increases Melee Damage by 10% while within 10m of a BLEEDING entity. Level 10: Melee Hits vs BLEEDING targets will Lifesteal 3% of base damage dealt.
Increases Melee damage by 25% when below 50% Max Health. Level 10: Increases Melee Critical Chance by 15% when below 50% Max Health.
Basic Melee Attacks increase the next Charge Attack by 7%. Max 3 Stacks. Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Charge Attack gains 100% Critical Chance.

Ranged.descricao: Increases Ranged Damage by 1% for every 5% of total Health present as Grey Health. Max 20% increase. Level 10: Increases Reload Speed for this weapon by 15% while Grey Health is present.

Increases Critical Chance of this weapon by 3% per unique Negative Status Effect on the enemy. Max 15% increase. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply CORRODED, dealing 75 CORROSIVE damage over 10s.

Increases this weapon‘s Elemental Damage by 5.5% for each unique Elemental Status Effect on the target. Level 10: Increases Mod Power Generation of Elemental Damage and Elemental Status damage by 20%.
Using this weapon's mod increases Mod Power Generation by 3% for 10s. Max 5 stacks. Level 10: Reduces Mod Power requirement of this weapon's mod by 10%.
This weapon becomes EMPOWERED when stowed for 5 seconds, granting 20% Critical Chance for 5 seconds after it is drawn. Level 10: While EMPOWERED, increases Critical Damage of this weapon by 15%.

Melee.descricao: Charged Melee Attacks increase the duration of Negative Status Effects on enemies by 10% of the original duration. Cannot exceed original max duration. Level 10: Increases Melee Charge Speed and Melee Attack Speed by 5% per entity within 20m with a Negative Status Effect. Max 4 stacks.
increases Melee Critical Chance by 5% when Grey Health is present. Level 10: Increases Melee Critical Damage by 0.5% for every 1% of Grey Health.
Increases Melee Damage by 5% per stack of CORRODED on the target. Level 10: Charged Melee Attacks apply CORRODED, dealing 250 ACID Damage over 10s.

Ranged.descricao: Increases this weapon's Ranged and Mod Damage by 5% to enemies within 7m. Level 10: Activating this weapon's Mod triggers a fixed 7m blast, dealing 50 Explosive Damage per 100 Mod Power spent in a single cast. Inflicts 1.5 Stagger Damage.
Increases Ranged Damage of this weapon by 1.25% for every 2.5m from the shooter to the target. Max 25% Level 10: Increases this weapon's ideal, Falloff, and Max Range by 5m.
Increases Ranged damage of this weapon by 1% to BURNING targets. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply BURNING, dealing 50 FIRE damage over 5s.
Increases this weapon's Mod Damage and Mod Generation by 15% for l0s when activating a Skill. Level 10: Activating this weapon's Mod reduces Skill Cooldowns by 1% for every 100 Mod Power spent.
Increases this weapon's Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 0.1% for each shot fired. Lasts 0.125s. Max 50 stacks. Level 10: Increases this weapon's Reload Speed by 1% per stack.
Increases Ranged Damage of this weapon by 10% to enemies within 7m. Level 10: Increases ranged Critical Chance of this weapon by 10% to enemies within 7m.

Melee.descricao: Skill activation grants Mage Strike for l0s increasing Melee Mod Generation by 50%. Level 10: Mage Strike also increases Melee Damage by 15%
While Brandishing a Melee Weapon, receiving Enemy Damage increases Melee Damage by 25% for 5s. Level 10: Receiving Enemy Damage while brandishing a Melee Weapon grants 1 stack of BULWARK for 5s.

Ranged.descricao: Increases this weapon's Fire Rate and Reload Speed by 2.5% per OVERLOADED entity within 15m. Max 5 stacks. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply OVERLOADED, dealing 75 SHOCK damage over 10s.
Each 10% of this weapon's magazine spent, cause an explosion for 5 Explosive Damage to targets within 0.5m of impact location. Level 10: Increases this weapon's explosive damage by 20%.
Increases the attached weapon's Ranged Damage by 15% after being stowed for 2s. Lasts 7s upon being brandished. Level 10: Automatically reloads the attached weapon after being stowed for 2s.

Spending 20% of this weapon's magazine grants a SHIELD for 5% of Max Health for 10s. Max 25% SHIELD. Level 10: Increases Ranged Critical Chance for this weapon by 10% when SHIELD is above 10% of Max Health.

Each enemy hit by Primary Fire grants 1 stack of REPERCUSSION, increasing Ranged Damage by 3% per stack. Max 5 stacks. Shots consume stacks. Level 10: Increases this weapon's Critical Chance by 3% per stack of REPERCUSSION.

When this weapon is above 25% Heat, a 7.5m Pulse deals 150 Explosive Damage once every 5s. Level 10: At Max Heat, a 10m Pulse deals 300 Explosive Damage which applies BURNING to all entities for 100 FIRE Damage over 20s. Can only happen once every 5s.

Melee.descricao: Increases Charged Melee Stamina Cost by 65%. Increases Charged Melee Damage by 25%. Level 10: After a Charged Melee Strike, increases Stamina Recovery Rate by 100% for 3s.
Dealing Melee Damage creates a 3m blast which deals 50 Explosive Damage. Can only happen once every 1s. Level 10: When Volatile Strike triggers a blast, increases Movement Speed by 20% for 5s.

Light Armor Set.descricao: Armor Sets focus on aesthetics rather than set bonuses, allowing for more freedom in Build variety, while the weight of an Armor Set plays a crucial role in determining the effectiveness of evasive maneuvers and overall combat proficiency, as lighter sets enable enhanced agility and fluidity of movement, facilitating easier and longer dodges compared to heavier sets. Bandit Set is a Light Armor Set, so you will experience fast Dodge with no Stamina cost penalty.

Head.descricao: I sed to wear a field cap and sunglasses combo like this during field operations. It's a practical and comfortable headwear that helps reduce glare and keeps the sun out of your eyes.

Although much of the knowledge of the ancient Pan has been lost to time, it is known they had their own form of magic. The lodestones are thought to be part of this, allowing them to create artifacts that reacted to each other's presence in unique and sometimes powerful ways.

Those we dubbed `pilots` were little more than tools--minds serving as interfaces. The Astropaths determined N'Erud's course, and the Custodian ensured the ship arrived safely. Pilots were merely delegates for our collective will.

That the One True King suffered the young prince to live despite his attempted coup is a curious thing. Either the king thought exile a punishment graver than death...or his mercy bespoke that which he dared not otherwise admit.

However, 9 points in the Strong Back trait is enough to wear this set with just medium encumbrance.

Head.descricao: A makeshift accessory that may not offer any protection to the head, but they do serve a vital function of shielding the eyes. With the harsh conditions of the wasteland and the debris flying around, it's crucial to keep your vision clear and safe.

The Red King's true name, you ask? Who's to say he was ever granted one? He was both to inherit a title, after all, and inherit it, he did! Of course, were he in possession of a true name, I would most certainly know it.

A hat that once belonged to some kind of man in black. Or did it? Mudtooth went through some kind of crazy experience to get this thing, though the details are a bit muddled. Either that, or he found it in a dumpster. You're going to choose to believe it's the former.

The weight of this crown is heavy, so much heavier than you might have guessed. Though aged, the shining metal has been carefully preserved, and the crown jewel radiates with a passionate fury you can scarcely comprehend.

Lovingly crafted by a skilled hatter who clearly takes great pride in their work. After being exposed to endless days of rain, the shell began to separate from the crown, so a woven cord was tied around the center to hold it in place-for now.

Game Base.descricao: When attacking a BLEEDING enemy, Crit Chance and Crit Damage are increased by 15%.
Grants a 15% increase to all damage. Consuming a Relic increases the amount to 25% for 15s.
Increases Stamina Regen by 25 and reduces Stamina cost by 50%
Increases Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 25% for 5s after striking enemy with a Charged Melee Attack.
Increases all damage dealt to targets suffering from a Status Effect by 20%.
Reduces Duration of Elemental Status Effects against wearer by 50%. Relic use cleanses Elemental Status effects and grants 25% of wearers Max Health to all allies within 20m when cleansed.
Increases weakspot damage by 50% for 10s after killing an enemy.
Gain 7.5% to all damage dealt and 3.75% Movement Speed for each piece of unequipped armor.
Gain 15% to all damage when Health is below 100%. 10% All Damage Bonus when below 50% HP (25% Max) Gain HASTE when below 50% Health.
Melee hits gain 3% base damage dealt as Lifesteal. For each 25% missing Health, gain 3% additional Melee Lifesteal. When Health is full, gain 35% Melee Damage.
Increases Explosion damage by 25%. Explosions apply 405 BURNING damage over 5s.
While a Shield is active, gain 20% damage and 4.5% of base dealt as Lifesteal.
Increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Attack Speed by 15%. For every missing 10% of Max Health, gain 4% Ranged Damage (Max 20%) and 5% Melee Damage (Max 25%).
While Grey Health is present, gain 15% to all damage dealt, 10% damage reduction and 1 additional hit before Grey Health is removed.
Increases ACID damage by 25% and CORROSIVE damage by 50%.
When below 50% health, chance to consume Relic on use is reduced by 50%. Final Relic Charge is not consumed on use, but effect cannot be triggered again for 30s.
Increases Status Effect damage by 20%. Applying a damaging Status Effect creates a 2m Explosion for 20% of the Status Effects full damage.
While a SHIELD is active, gain 10 Critical Chance and 15% to all damage dealt.
Increases all damage dealt by 2.5% for 10s after killing an enemy. Stacks 10x. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.
Ranged damage Lifesteals 3% of base damage dealt. At full health, ranged damage is increased by 25%.
Increases Mod damage by 25%. Activating a MOD grants HASTE for 15s.
Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 25%.
Automatically reloads Magazine over time. Does not work for single shot weapons.
Spending at least 30% of Firearms magazine to deal damage increases Melee damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 5x.
Gain double Skill Charges. Increases Skill Cooldowns by 25%. For Heavy Weapons, doubles Heavy Weapon Ammo instead.
Taking damage from any source increases all damage dealt by 20% and reduces all incoming damage by 10%. Lasts 15s.
Standing for 0.5s still increases Fire Rate by 20%, Reload Speed by 15%, and reduces Recoil by 50%. Lasts 2s after moving.
While BULWARK is active, gain 15% to all damage dealt and HASTE.
Increases Mod and Skill Cast Speed by 35%. Casting a Skill or Mod increases all damage by 15% for 20s.
While a SHIELD is active, gain 25% Mod damage and generate 30% additional Mod power.
For every 10% of Health missing (Max 50%), gain 10% increased Relic Use Speed and 7% chance to not consume a Relic Charge.
Increases Mod Duration by 50%. Increases Mod Cost by 10%.
Reduces Encumbrance by 40% and Stamina Cost by 35%.
Increases Melee Damage by 35% and causes all successful Melee Attacks to restore 10 Stamina.
Grants 25 Health, 25 Stamina, and -10 Armor Encumbrance.
Reduces the Damage of Status Effects applied to wearer by 50%. Gain 25% increased Damage when suffering from a Status Effect or Blight.
Increases Grey Health conversion by an additional 100%. When Grey Health Conversion triggers, gain 5x the amount as Mod Power.
After 5s of not being damaged, increases all damage dealt by 15%. Increases to 30% if Health is full.
Gain 10% of base Ranged damage dealt as Lifesteal. Reduces Healing Effectiveness by 95%.
Gain 15% Critical Chance and HASTE when within 20m of an entity suffering from a Status Effect.
Increase Relic Healing Effectiveness by 50% Activating a Relic grants HASTE for 25s.
Increases Mod damage by 20%. Enhances the effect of Faerin's Sigil and Faelin's Sigil by 50% per Sigil equipped.
Firearm damage adds stacks which increase the damage of stowed firearm by x1.02% for 15s. Stacks 10x.
Neutral Backdash creates a Magic Card lasting 1s. If Card absorbs enemy damage gain 25% Critical Chance for 5s. Neutral Backdash cost 15% additional Stamina.
After killing an enemy, gain 10% Ranged damage and 2m Firearm Range. Stacks 3x Lasts 10s. ranged Weakspot Hits will refresh duration.
Increases all damage dealt to BLEEDING targets by 20%. Bonus increases to 30% for targets with 50% or lower Health.
